metadata.how_to_trigger: Press the release button (S_IRN_PrisonerGroup5_Lever_77a285e1-8ab7-4e05-bfd8-9014d07d6ea1)  to release the hostage from the torture bed, which will free them and play the AD.

0.speaker: Thindo Vintervur
0.text: AHA! Free - but by Gond, we might already be done for!

1.speaker: Thindo Vintervur
1.text: AHA! Thindo Vintervur lives to see ANOTHER day!
